Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect

As of right now, we are offering all international investors under our Regulation S placement. We will be offering a Regulation D 506C to accredited investors in the US & abroad. Lastly, we plan to release the HLX token to the US public under Regulation A+.  It is very important for us to stay compliant with any regulations.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: Updated with token details...  Follow Us on Social Media    We are a Decentralized Health Management Platform   Our first module will create a new market  Precision Preventative Medicine  By adding gamification to being healthy, we will reduce the burden on the reactive healthcare system by minimizing 5 risk factors that contribute to the top chronic conditions.  We also understand the importance of data security and reducing waste, so the platform is designed from the ground up to support permission based access, automation, and deep learning for future expansion.  Click the image below to watch our 1 minute explainer video   Click the image below to learn more about the FitFlow Challenge   The FitFlow Challenge  Helix3 will fund the challenge 10,000,000 HLX (~$800,000 USD at token generation) to reward participants for achieving optimal levels in 5 health and fitness measurements.  Participants must connect their patient portal and activity tracking device to the App in order to participate in the challenge.  Custom challenges can be created using any information that can be pulled from a patient portal or IoMT (Medical IoT)    The consolidation of patient portal and fitness device data into a single source of truth for which the member has full control happens inside what we call, the Helix Twin    SPEND HLX ON HEALTHY REWARDS  The Helix3 Marketplace will soon become the "Groupon of Healthcare"    Merchants list products and services with controls on the number of redemptions, driving customers to their products and services.  Initially, health and wellness gift cards from 50 health related retail stores in addition to lotteries for fitness devices will be available.    Click the image below to learn how we make money   Meet the Founders     Top Advisor    Meet the Rest of the HELIX3 Team     HELIX3's Path to Success    HELIX3 FUTURE MODULES    HELIX3 TOKEN - HLX   Symbol: HLX Type: ERC20 Supply: 888,000,000 For Public Sale: 355,200,000 (40% of total) Emission Rate: No new HLX tokens will ever be created Price: 1 HLX token = $0.08 equivalent of ETH and/or BTC Accepted Currencies: ETH, BTC  Private-sale Period: August 1, 2018 - Sept 30, 2018 Bonus: 30% bonus tokens For Private Sale: 187,500,000 + 56,250,000 Bonus Tokens Phase 1 Private Soft-cap: $250 Thousand USD equivalent of ETH and/or BTC Phase 1 Private Hard-cap: $15 Million USD equivalent of ETH and/or BTC  Public-sale Period: October 1, 2018 - Dec 30, 2018 Bonus: 25% week 1 and 2, 20% week 3 and 4, 15% week 5 and 6, 10% week 7 and 8, 5% week 9 and 10. For Public Sale: Remainder of 355,200,000 tokens not sold in the private sale Public Soft-cap: $2 million USD equivalent of ETH and/or BTC Public Hard Cap: Full sale of 355,200,000 HLX public sale tokens. (Max $28M USD)    HELIX3 PRIVATE SALE OPEN NOW - ACCREDITED INVESTORS ONLY   CLICK to REGISTER to our WHITELIST!

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: Thanks for the question.  Our first goal is to get a critical mass of users on the platform. This will create enough of a sample size for many different directions.  For example:  We can apply deep learning and AI to customize plans to help people achieve optimum health based on their genomic data for example.  We see clinical trials being able to tie rewards into taking medications as prescribed, improving their accuracy.  We see families challenging their loved one to quit smoking or achieve a BMI goal and having it verified by a third party. No way to game the system.  We plan to create Advanced Telehealth Centers that can be used to extend the reach of healthcare improving access to care leveraging IoMT devices.  We list another 8 or so in our whitepaper, but when you think about it now, there are many uses that we can come up with right now, and many more that won‚Äôt be possible until that new IoMT device is available.  I‚Äôm curious what you are thinking as well?  One thing is for certain, we are focusing on the consumer/patient first ensuring they are rewarded for sharing data and with being healthy.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: Great question. We will allocate unsold public tokens to the Ecosystem Partners pool instead of the more traditional burn. Only our partners and sponsors can purchase these tokens directly from Helix3. These sponsors are responsible for creating challenges and providing the HLX reward. If for any reason HLX were not available to be purchased in the open market, growth of the platform will be stalled.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: We do not plan on any new token emissions outside of the initial token generation event.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: Me (Ray Belleville) and my co-founder (Nicholas White) are heading it up.  We have a great team that believes in it and has a lot of experience. Our top Advisor is Tim Draper‚Äôs Crypto Analyst at Draper.vc, Abhishek Punia. We are very fortunate to have him.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: We believe that there is a market, much like Groupon has, for discount coupons for health and fitness that can be purchased with the tokens. We also believe that people will use the crypto to enter into sweepstakes for new or trending tech. As the platform grows with different types of challenges, we believe very personalized goals will be developed and there will ways to earn these tokens by getting healthy.  As far as needing blockchain, it is for a number of reasons. The tokens are used as part of a machine-to-machine communication process. The longer term vision for Helix3 is to have Advanced Telehealth Centers powered by IoMT devices, that can off-load work from Primary Care Physicians (over 3 weeks AVG wait time today). There are deep learning and AI applications, clinical research and trials. Once a platform is created that brings data together to be used in a meaningful way, it will be vital that permissions, identity, sharing, controls and transparency are part of the foundation of the platform.  We believe all these things warrant the use of blockchain along with the tokens being used as loyalty and rewards points, which act as currency in the marketplace.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: Great question. Here are a couple of points  1) We are focused on meaningful use of the data. More specifically, lowering the prevalence of the top 5 chronic diseases that burden healthcare. Others are more focused on recreating the systems, which will in turn create a similar problem around data portability. 2) We are not looking to disrupt healthcare, we want to integrate and enhance how the data is used. If we can change the foundation and not change the interface to the system, we believe we have a higher probability of success. Companies spent billions of dollars to convert to digital systems, they won‚Äôt be willing to change the entire system again for another 10 years. 3) We are leveraging IoT and patient portal integration to verify that progress has been made towards a goal, not simply using the honor system or just the activity performed. By focusing on the consumer, we can offer value in parallel to other systems which can lead to a foundation change, not a complete swap. 4) We have one of the best Advisor teams when it comes to variety of experience across healthcare. Among them is Abhishek Punia who is a crypto analyst with Draper Associates. This is invaluable and very unique 5) We are located in Boston, MA which is the central hub for all things healthcare in the US. The US is where the problems in healthcare are seen to be some of the worst of all developed nations.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: We've got some explainer videos coming.  Our Bounty closed yesterday. Anyone who participated can check their sheets for final stakes starting Tuesday, July 3, 2018  Thanks everyone

Author: erikstarfish
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: This looks like a good project but it has many existing competitors in the market, please give specific notable advantage of this project from other similar projects offering the same service.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: Great question.  Helix3 is the first platform plan with a vision that puts the patient first. Most other companies are focused on how they can get free access to your data for their profit. We are building an open ecosystem that rewards our members and encourages sharing.  We are also conscious of the business side as well, ensuring that our platform can integrate with existing way of doing things, but with a lot more trust and confidence.  We will be the first to integrate patient portal, activity, and IoMT data into a data exchange and rewards platform, which we believe will spark a tremendous amount of innovation in precision preventative medicine and healthcare in general.  We are located in Boston, MA with strong connections into many facets of healthcare. Boston is a hub for healthcare innovation and practice in the US.  One of our founders is American, with many experiences in the US system and selling to healthcare. The other is an internet trailblazer from Canada, who experience a very different approach to healthcare. which has a very different approach to healthcare. We believe this gives us a unique combined perspective on how to solve healthcare challenges.  Lastly, we have one of the best teams available. Everyone believes in what is possible and is working towards a common goal. There are too many to list here, but you can see them on our website (http://helix3.co). Abhishek Punia (Crypto Analyst for Tim Draper) definitely gets an honorable mention considering how close he is to the market and how well he‚Äôs advised us so for.

Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect

Participants must connect their patient portal and activity tracking device to the App in order to participate in the challenge.  Custom challenges can be created using any information that can be pulled from a patient portal or IoMT (Medical IoT)    The consolidation of patient portal and fitness device data into a single source of truth for which the member has full control happens inside what we call, the Helix Twin    SPEND HLX ON HEALTHY REWARDS  The Helix3 Marketplace will soon become the "Groupon of Healthcare"    Merchants list products and services with controls on the number of redemptions, driving customers to their products and services.  Initially, health and wellness gift cards from 50 health related retail stores in addition to lotteries for fitness devices will be available.    Click the image below to learn how we make money   Meet the Founders     Top Advisor    Meet the Rest of the HELIX3 Team     HELIX3's Path to Success    HELIX3 FUTURE MODULES    HELIX3 TOKEN - HLX   Symbol: HLX Type: ERC20 Supply: 888,000,000 For Public Sale: 355,200,000 (40% of total) Emission Rate: No new HLX tokens will ever be created Price: 1 HLX token = $0.08 equivalent of ETH and/or BTC Accepted Currencies: ETH, BTC  Private-sale Period: August 1, 2018 - Sept 30, 2018 Bonus: 30% bonus tokens For Private Sale: 187,500,000 + 56,250,000 Bonus Tokens Phase 1 Private Soft-cap: $250 Thousand USD equivalent of ETH and/or BTC Phase 1 Private Hard-cap: $15 Million USD equivalent of ETH and/or BTC  Public-sale Period: October 1, 2018 - Dec 30, 2018 Bonus: 25% week 1 and 2, 20% week 3 and 4, 15% week 5 and 6, 10% week 7 and 8, 5% week 9 and 10. Author: enflammer
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: Hello here is what i think after a quick check:  - Health datas project, we can find load of those nowadays, but I do believe this one might be successful. Why? this leads to the 2nd point - The team seems very solid to me, experienced people with lot of backgrounds and connections. Advisors look good too - Bonus during sales: corrects (not too much that would devaluate token price later on) - Supply: total of 888M for 0.08$ expected, that would represents a reachable goal - Tokens will be used to reward people reaching their goals, to make transactions easier (through the system) and also insurance's / programme incentives.  I have only personnal issue: the power of insurances on our datas. The team answered me on telegram (very good support guys) and told me people could decide which datas would be shared. Also developping (i quote) "a claims module that will proxy the information ensuring the insurance company doesn‚Äôt even need to see the data... just the result that a valid procedure was executed for a verified member with coverage"  For all these reasons, i have a very good feeling about this project and i will keep an eye on it. Will dig deeper into the project, but your team is your big asset.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: Thank you for commenting. Helix3 is a next-gen healthcare platform that rewards members for consolidating data and achieving health and wellness goals. We bring meaningful use to the members data through various modules designed to improve patient value, security and access control. By bringing together secure and connected data, a goal achievement system, and a marketplace for healthcare products and services, we are creating the foundation of a new and improved healthcare ecosystem.  Our secure platform, built on blockchain technology, ensures data breaches are a thing of the past by using advanced encryption, cryptography, and de-identifying techniques. This enables the consolidation of health data (patient partials, fit devices, medical devices) that will be leveraged for support AI, deep learning, and other innovations. It also shrinks the scope of an attack to a single record, significantly lowering the target value.  The  goal achievement system is powered by FitFlows, which have a defined goal, activities to achieve the goal, and different milestones to measure goal progress. The achievement of each milestone is rewarded with tokens that can be spent in the the Helix3 healthcare marketplace, or at the healthcare provider much like a loyalty rewards program.  Members can get support building their FitFlows from healthcare providers that can help support the successful achievement of the goals by defining activities, milestones, and funding rewards. Members can view FitFlow provider ratings, reviews, and an automatically calculated goal achievement rating, and eventually be guided to better health through personal recommendations and FitFlows.  In the Helix app, users can use their health and activity data to earn rewards from goal sponsors and FitFlow providers. Rewards are provided in Helix Tokens (HLX) and can be spent on health related products and services in our marketplace.     At the center of the platform is the ever growing Helix Twin. The Helix Twin consolidates health information including EMR data, activity records and 3rd party verified measurement into a single pane of glass that is used to create optimal FitFlows, personalized for our members. Helix Twin organizes and automatically updates its record through our integration framework. This enables seamless interoperability between all parties interested in lowering the risk and cost of poor health.  Our mission is to bring the healthcare industry together in a meaningful way, creating more patient value across the healthcare ecosystem which provides better care to billions of people around the world. By improving overall health and bringing automation and improved controls to health management,  Helix3 aims to reduce the trillions of dollars in healthcare waste globally and improve quality of life.

Author: RayBelleville
Title: [ANN] [HLX] Helix3 - Monetize Activities and Data - Connect - Compete - Collect
Body: Introducing Stephen Chiricosta. A very active member of our advisory board, and early contributor.  Stephen brings a wealth of advice pertaining to fundraising and Precision Medicine.  * Member and Healthcare Transformer at StartUp Health * Co-founder of LuminaCare Solution, a precision medicine company. * Strategic Advisor to Care Analytics.
